Grade: 95

Comment: This response provides a thorough and well-articulated explanation of the Biblical basis for parental authority over children. The student effectively integrates relevant scriptural references to support each point and offers a comprehensive overview of the responsibilities and privileges parents have in raising their children according to God's design. A strong emphasis on nurturing faith, training, discipline, and protection is evident throughout the response, reflecting a solid understanding of the Christian perspective on parental authority. Great job!
